programme.title: Beyond Borders
programme.desc: Near the US-Mexican border, ICE agents are primarily concerned with identifying and deporting dangerous criminals back to their home countries. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Dog Patrol
programme.desc: Sam and Arlo chase down a group scarpering school vandals, while customs drug dog Zion busts a package wide open. (S11, ep 1)

programme.title: Dog Patrol
programme.desc: Cash-and-drug seeking star Yarra rolls on a few finds, while Rotorua police team Luke and Skudder hit the trail after a disappearing speed demon. (S11, ep 2)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Shakedown!: A hustler tries to make Les an offer he can't refuse, but the Golds fight back and turn the tables on the shady customer. (S12, ep 6)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Along Came a Spider: Ashley pranks Seth to teach him a lesson about locking his door, but Seth evens the score with a practical joke of his own. (S12, ep 7)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Inside Job: When the Golds uncover a series of bogus pawns, their investigation leads to a trusted employee and a confession. (S12, ep 8)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: The Hot Rod: Les and Seth visit a customer with a garage full of amazing vintage cars. Against his kids' wishes, Les offers big money for one of the seller's golden oldies. (S12, ep 9)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Ashley in Charge: With Les and Seth away at the Autorama car show - and Ashley in charge of the store - the employees go a little crazy. (S12, ep 10)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Karen in the Middle: Karen tries to make peace between Seth and Ashley, Bobby J takes a two-storey tractor for a spin and a watch snob riles Seth. (S12, ep 11)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Million Dollar Deal Part 1: A ventriloquist leaves Karen and Bobby J speechless, while an angry mixed martial arts fighter takes a swing at Byron. (S12, ep 12)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Million Dollar Deal Part 2: The Golds' million dollar art deal takes more twists and turns, but eventually, Les shakes hands on the single biggest purchase in store history. (S12, ep 13)

programme.title: Container Wars
programme.desc: Surf's Up: A surprise item may send the Israelis in search of major dollars. Jason strikes on a container full of wood and weird gear. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: Container Wars
programme.desc: The Big Not-So-Easy: Items from New Orleans stimulate a frenzy of bidding, while a refrigerated unit sends chills down bidders' spines. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: Container Wars
programme.desc: New Blood: A new team surface and pose a threat to Mo, a three-wheeled item entices Matthew and a cluster of table-tennis balls cause confusion. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: Container Wars
programme.desc: Bigger is Better: Buyers clash over outdoor BBQs and a portable rave unit. Mo and Ty take a big gamble on a speedy prize. (S2, ep 10)

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There:...
programme.desc: Government Cover Ups: Has the US Government been hiding the truth about aliens? Journalist Tony Harris and his team will evaluate compelling evidence. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Alien Files Unsealed
programme.desc: The 1952 Wave: In Spring 1952, reports of UFO sightings shot through the roof. Can former US Air Officials shed any light on this? (S4, ep 2)

programme.title: Alien Files Unsealed
programme.desc: The Freedom of Information Act: In 1969, the US government officially announced it would stop investigating UFOs, but declassified documents seem to tell another story. (S4, ep 3)

programme.title: Close Encounters
programme.desc: A couple spot a huge blimp-shaped craft hovering over Michigan's Lake Erie in 1988. In 1963, two sisters and their housekeeper report being knocked down by a UFO emitting flames. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: Close Encounters
programme.desc: In 1993, a teenage girl walking her dog in Shropshire, England, witnesses a cylindrical object in the sky. School kids in Florida report multiple UFO sightings in 1967. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: When Big Things Go Wrong
programme.desc: Overloaded: Clues from other disasters are examined to determine what caused the I-35 bridge in Minneapolis to collapse without warning at the peak of rush hour traffic. (1 of 6)

programme.title: When Big Things Go Wrong
programme.desc: Ripple Effect: This episode explores a catastrophic high-speed train crash in Spain, an out of control cruise liner in Venice, the Deepwater Horizon tragedy and more. (2 of 6)

programme.title: When Big Things Go Wrong
programme.desc: House of Cards: A high-rise hotel under construction on a busy New Orleans street unexpectedly collapses, leaving citizens baffled. (3 of 6)

programme.title: When Big Things Go Wrong
programme.desc: Doomed From the Start: Italy falls victim to one of the worst engineering disasters when the Morandi bridge suddenly collapses. (4 of 6)

programme.title: When Big Things Go Wrong
programme.desc: Hidden Flaws: When a DC-10 aeroplane explodes mid-flight over Iowa, the quick-thinking pilot saves 184 passengers. But what caused such a huge disaster? (5 of 6)

programme.title: When Big Things Go Wrong
programme.desc: Man vs Machine: When a Boeing 777 crashes into San Francisco Airport with no warning, engineers race to figure out what could have caused such a disaster. (6 of 6)

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Ancient Dimensions: Andy and Paul visit one of the world's largest sites of ancient Native American petroglyphs, discovering rock art that could provide compelling new evidence. (S2, ep 4)

programme.title: Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Behind the Gates - The Fugal Factor: Matty Blake meets Brandon Fugal to discuss his purchase of Skinwalker Ranch in 2016, getting new insights about the team's investigation.

programme.title: Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Behind the Gates - Circling the Triangle: Dr Travis Taylor takes a look back at the shocking events that have occurred during the investigation of the so-called Triangle.

programme.title: New: Ancient Superstructures
programme.desc: The Holy Sepulchre of Jerusalem: Uncover the secrets of the Holy Sepulchre, the sacred Christian site built in the same spot as the death and resurrection of Jesus. (S3, ep 1)

programme.title: Ghost Ships
programme.desc: Halifax Explosion: When the SS Mont-Blanc and the SS Imo collided in 1917 in the harbour of Halifax, Canada, the subsequent explosion killed or injured almost 11,000 people. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Lost Relic Hunters
programme.desc: Celtic Gold: Hamilton White and Carl Cookson are back on the trail of some truly astonishing relics in season two. (2 of 5)

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera: Top 100

programme.title: National Park Mysteries
programme.desc: Great Smokey Mountains National Park: A stroll through a national park that is the alleged underground base for a powerful secret society. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: National Park Mysteries
programme.desc: Mark Twain National Forest: Some claim that the dark, mysterious energies that surround this national park point to treasures from a lost civilisation that are hidden there. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: Encounter: UFO
programme.desc: Sometimes, the mysterious unidentified objects people see in the sky touch down and leave physical evidence behind. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Mega Disasters 3
programme.desc: Noah's Great Flood: Could the biblical story of Noah be true? When oceans surged 8,000 years ago, water burst through the Bosporus Strait with catastrophic effects. (S3, ep 3)

programme.title: Mega Disasters 3
programme.desc: Volcanic Winter: When the largest volcanic eruption of the past two million years occurred 75,000 years ago, a shield of debris formed and deflected the sun's rays. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S8, ep 59)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Slice And Dice: When someone brings in an antique key gun, can the Pawn Stars unlock the mystery behind it? Then, a rare 1600s blade slices its way into the shop. (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: Container Wars
programme.desc: Day Late and a Dollar Short: Four containers are auctioned after their holiday deadline passes, Uzi gets a fright and an enigmatic logo could lead to a cash windfall. (S2, ep 12)

programme.title: Storage Hunters

programme.title: Storage Hunters

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Draculaura practices witchcraft illegally in 'Food Fight', then in 'Unfinished Brain-ness', Frankie, cursed from their brain's past life, gets help from Frankie, Clawdeen, and Draculaura. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Clawdeen must accept who she is in 'Case of the Moon-Days', then in 'Portrait of a Monster', Frankie's identity crisis during picture day makes her zap a camera into a soulsucking menace. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Schooled!: Lincoln tries to swap school classes after being separated from the gang, but ends up being transferred to Canada. Lori doesn't fit in on any of the college dorm floors. (S5, ep 1 & 2)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Leni struggles to follow in Lori's footsteps as the family's babysitter in 'The Boss Maybe', then in 'Family Bonding', Secret agents Lincoln and Clyde investigate the Loud's new neighbours. (S5, ep 3)

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures
programme.desc: Duke Detain takes his first day off in 'Duke Time', then in 'Harpy Stubbs', an unlikely friendship develops between the world's biggest pop star and Harl Hubbs, the city's humble handyman. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Pluffs!: Blossom and Brainy are transported to an alternate universe where the Smurfs are grey and mean. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: The Treasure of Catbeard: Neko involves Pilou and her fellows in a cat-tastic mission. Giving them a map and a lucky doubloon, he invites them to find the treasure of pirate Catbeard! (S2, ep 21)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Mice on the Run!: Boss, Blister and Scab are on the trail of three mice who ended up in the garden of Winston's villa. The Buffycats lend a paw to the daddy of the mice to save them! (S2, ep 22)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Mara, the Hippo: A wooden crate falls from a running truck, and inside it is Mara, a small female hippo who was returning to Africa. The Buffycats help Mara get on the plane home. (S2, ep 23)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Bester's phobia threatens to derail her chances of being dance champ in 'Get the Hump', then in 'Sing For Your Supper', Best and Bester go busking, but will Best cope with competition? (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: There is a certain amount of confusion, right away, in 'You Don't Know Sponge', and in 'Tunnel of Glove', SpongeBob and Pearl get stuck in the Tunnel of Glove, a romantic river ride at Glove World.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward becomes friends with a new neighbour in 'New Fish In Town', and then in 'Love That Squid', Squidward gets ready to go out on a date, and SpongeBob assists him.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: The Dinghies travel to outer space in 'Hats Off to Space', then in 'In a Nut's Shell', After discovering his empty shell, Narlene and Nobby disguise themselves at Camp Master Krabs. (S1, ep 26)

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: Camp Master Krabs finally hires a camp nurse in 'First Aid Last Aid', then in 'Night of the Living Stench', all the campers try to win the Stinkiest Camp in the Forest award. (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Viral: After Brittany and the girls release a video that goes viral, Alvin, Simon and Theodore try to stop it.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Temporary Mom: When the boys get stuck with Miss Miller as a babysitter, they each take a crack at finding a replacement.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Clumsy Jeanette: Jeanette is suddenly the clumsiest person on the planet. Is there something wrong with her... or her new glasses? (S4, ep 2b)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Mega Bounce Battle: The boys disobey Dave's orders to not play a dangerous game then have to hide their injuries when they get hurt. (S4, ep 18a)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick build a golf course indoors in 'A Friendly Game', and then in 'Sentimental Sponge', SpongeBob has trouble throwing things away due to the memories attached to his possessions.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When Patrick suddenly grows a beard, he decides it's time to act like a grown-up in 'Squidward's School For Grown-Ups', and then in 'Oral Report', SpongeBob must face his fear of public speaking.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Squidina hosts a television show to pass a home economics class in 'Home Ecch', and then in 'Fun and Done', Patrick and SpongeBob try to unlock a dull child's imagination. (S1, ep 19)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Cecil shows Patrick his moustache collection in 'Dad's Stache Stash', and then in 'A Root Galoot', The Star family brings a mandrake root into their home. (S1, ep 22)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover

programme.title: Rosko's Glam Rock! 1971-1974
programme.desc: Wham bam glam craziness with The Emperor spreading the love from Los Angeles! 3 years of music - 1971 to 1974 - that defined a decade and forged our fabulous fashions!

programme.title: Glam Rock Night!
programme.desc: All night - rewind to a time of big hair, outrageous makeup and platform shoes. The greatest gems of glam pop & rock, including Alvin Stardust, Abba, Slade & Wizzard.

programme.title: GBH! Great Brit Hits of the 70s
programme.desc: 25 classic hits from the Brits - songs that have stood the test of time. Including 10cc, Bryan Ferry, Queen & Kate Bush!

programme.title: Morning Has Broken!
programme.desc: From the era of glam rock, new wave and disco, it's all the hits from just one decade - the 1970s! Platform boots and flares at the ready?

programme.title: Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1975
programme.desc: Back-to-back number 1s from 1975 - a year that included the Quo, Bowie, Queen, and also saw Kojak rapping! With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.title: It Spent HOW Long At No.1?!
programme.desc: Once these tracks made it to the top spot there was no knocking them off! This is our countdown of the 50 longest chart toppers of the 1970s!

programme.title: Spring Has Sprung!
programme.desc: Feelgood hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?

programme.title: Bruno's Can You Believe It?!
programme.desc: Incredible facts and amazing trivia about some of the decade's most famous songs and videos! This is two hours of Radio 1 legend Bruno Brookes asking 'Can You Believe It?!'

programme.title: Essential 70s: The No 3s
programme.desc: You won't believe these 70 hits never even reached the top 2 in the UK! Includes songs from Abba & Michael Jackson, plus forgotten tracks from Fox, Faron Young & Fiddler's Dram.

programme.title: 70s Love Songs
programme.desc: Non-stop love songs, back to back, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, the Bee Gees and Minnie Riperton.

programme.title: Simon Bates' Rock Ballads! 1970-79
programme.desc: We didn't yet call them Power Ballads, but some masters of the genre - Boston, Toto & Whitesnake - were already at it! Simes has twenty-five power pop love songs and ballads - in order.

programme.title: Cuddle on the Couch - The Love 40
programme.desc: Three hours of 70s love. What more could you ask for a long smooch on the sofa?

programme.title: Help Me Make It Through the Night!
programme.desc: Non-stop love songs, back to back all night, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Ripperton.

programme.title: Lessons in Love! 70s v 80s
programme.desc: 50 love songs - a lesson from the 70s followed by another from the 80s! Including Debby Boone, Hot Chocolate, Bette Midler, Neil Diamond and Roberta Flack.

programme.title: Lessons in Love! 70s v 80s

programme.desc: Bling Bling Bear: Inspired by a magazine showing a man offering a diamond to a woman, Grizzy imagines himself offering the ranger's engagement ring to his beloved she-bear. (S1 Ep44)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Voodoo Blanket: The Lemmings prepare a dream afternoon snack with the last jar of chocolate spread in the cupboard. (S1 Ep46)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Prints: Grizzy discovers that he can print images taken with the ranger's camera which is connected to a state-of-the-art printer. (S1 Ep47)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Fferm Fach

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'n ddiwrnod chwaraeon Pentre Papur Pop! On today's poptastic adventure, it's a Pop Paper City sports day! Mai-Mai is the sports day judge!

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Ai caws yw'r lleuad? Gall Odo a Dwdl fynd I'r lleuad a dod nol a darn I bawb yn y Gwersyll? Cawn weld. Odo figures out a way to go to the moon and bring a piece back for his friends.

programme.title: Awyr Iach

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Heddiw mae Ben Dant yn ymuno disgyblion Ysgol Y Graig, Merthyr Tudful i greu trysor penigamp. Ben Dant is on a new adventure to recycle and turn rubbish and waste into a masterpiece.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae hi'n wyl Ganol Haf a Llwyd yw'r llywydd. Ond pan mae Llwyd yn mynd yn styc yn ty sut all yr wyl ddechrau hebddo? It's the Midsummer Festival, but something happens to badger.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Ma'r efeillaid yn edrych ymlaen i fwyta crempog, ond ma 'na greadur bach arall sydd yn awyddus i fwyta eu brecwast, pry cop o'r enw Prys! A spider called Prys is after the twins' pancakes!

programme.title: New: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Twm Twrch heddiw? What's happening in Twm Twrch's world today?

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Os wyt ti'n dathlu dy ben-blwydd, dyma gyfle i ti weld dy lun ar Cyw. If you're celebrating your birthday, you may be lucky enough to see your photo on today's Cyw!

programme.title: Y Cosmos
programme.desc: Sut a phryd bydd y bydysawd yn darfod? Wedi 100 mlynedd o chwilio, mae gwyddonwyr yn gallu dweud sut a phryd bydd y diwedd yn dod. Exploring how and when the universe might end.

programme.title: Y Llais

programme.title: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol

programme.title: Ty Ffit

programme.title: Y WAL

programme.title: Pl-droed: Cymru v Denmarc

programme.title: Villain (1971)
programme.desc: 1971. Drama. Director: Michael Tuchner. Stars Richard Burton, Ian McShane & Nigel Davenport. Your everyday London businessman and sadistic gang leader. Once you've met, you'll wish you hadn't. [S]

programme.title: Up The Chastity Belt
programme.desc: 1971. Comedy. Director: Bob Kellett. Stars: Frankie Howerd, Eartha Kitt, Anna Quayle, Roy Hudd. Lurkalot is a serf who sells chastity belts and love potions at the local market place. [S]

programme.title: The Vengeance of She
programme.desc: 1968. Fantasy. Directed by Cliff Owen. Stars John Richardson, Olga Schoberov & Edward Judd. A young girl is drawn to the ancient city of Kuma to succeed the lost former ruler Ayesha as empress. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Circus Painting and Fishing for Pollock. 1980. Jack Hargreaves visits his circus family friends where a travelling artist is at work, and then he goes sea fishing off the coast of Poole. [S]

programme.title: Scarlet Thread
programme.desc: 1951. Crime drama directed by Lewis Gilbert and starring Kathleen Byron, Laurence Harvey and Sydney Tafler. Two high flying crooks take part in a robbery that goes very wrong. [S]

programme.title: Dick Barton at Bay
programme.desc: 1950. Action. Director: Godfrey Grayson. Stars Don Stannard, Tamara Desni & George Ford. Dick Barton is assigned to find a kidnapped professor and deactivate a death ray before catastrophe occurs. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed at the beginning of April. [S]

programme.title: The Big Job
programme.desc: 1965. Comedy. A gang of crooks are caught on a big job. 15 years later they find their loot is now buried under a police station. Stars Sidney James, Sylvia Syms, Dick Emery & Joan Sims. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Where Have All...
programme.desc: ... the Butterflies Gone? 1968. An enchanting look into the natural world of the butterfly and the reasons for the apparent shortage of them.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro Goes to School. 1962. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Frank Wilcox & Eleanor Audley. Jed attempts to enrol Jethro at an exclusive elementary school, but the proprietor is convinced it is a hoax. [S]

programme.title: Cinebox Memories
programme.desc: British Rock 'n' Roll icon Russ Sainty performs Go Away Little Girl in this brilliant musical short.

programme.title: Village of the Giants
programme.desc: 1965. Fantasy. Directed by Bert I. Gordon. Stars Tommy Kirk, Johnny Crawford & Beau Bridges. A group of teens grow into giants after eating a boy genius's invention and decide to terrorise a town. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Clock King's Crazy Crimes. 1966. Stars Adam West & Walter Slezak. The Clock King arranges for one of his trick timepieces to be sold to the Harry Hummert Jewellery Shop so he can loot it. [S]

programme.title: Bandido
programme.desc: 1956. Western. Directed by Richard Fleisher. Stars Robert Mitchum, Ursula Thiess & Gilbert Roland. An adventurer teams up with a rebel leader to steal an arms shipment due for government troops. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life The Sinking City
programme.desc: 1968. An intriguing look at the efforts being made to prevent Venice from sinking into the mud.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: A Bushel of Apples. 1960. Stars Richard Greene & Harry H. Corbett. Friar Tuck learns that a Sir Watkyn is extorting wages and livestock from the serfs and turns to the church for a solution. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: The Shooting Master. 1986. Lock, stock and barrel Jack explains the working of his great-grandfather's shotgun. Then he visits a shooting school on a disused railway line. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: We start with a trip to Durham's beaches in the 1960s and a look at the life of a sea coal man, we keep up with the fashions and products of 1949 and boogie with the 'The Avons' in 1962. [S]

programme.title: Train of Events
programme.desc: 1949. Drama. Directed by Sidney Cole, Charles Crichton and Basil Dearden. Starring Jack Warner, Susan Shaw and Gladys Henson. A train disaster is told as four short stories. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Model Girl

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: The Secret Ingredient - Chef Kitty: Nori is missing the secret ingredient to bake his mega-cake, but Chef Kitty helps her friend reach the top of Cherry Mountain to get what he needs. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: On A Roll - Athlete Kitty: It's time for Cherry Town's Roller Skating Boogie Woogie Party, but Zonty doesn't know how to roller skate! Athlete Kitty comes to his rescue. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: The Legend of Billy: Ollie, Billy's cousin, has come to stay and has brought an instant camera with her. She has decided to do a report on 'Billy, the Super Cowboy of the Wild West'. (S1 Ep33)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Well-beeing: What happens when bees overeat chocolates? Masha becomes their personal trainer! Get ready! Let's start weight loss exercises! (S6 Ep6)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Unfriended?: Red or yellow? Masha and the Bear argued which colour is more beautiful, and a wall grew between them. All this turns into exhausting competition of searching new friends. (S6 Ep8)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Shower Power: When forest orderlies are powerless, dealing with a real epidemic is not an easy task. But Masha gets down to business, the main thing is perky laughter! (S6 Ep9)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
